meta_info.name: CAPABILITY
meta_info.description: Capability of a role, such as  ehr modifier,  health care provider. Capability should be backed up by credentials.

attributes.name: credentials
attributes.description: The qualifications of the performer of the role for this capability. This might include professional qualifications and official identifications such as provider numbers etc.

attributes.name: time_validity
attributes.description: Valid time interval for the credentials of this capability.
